title: Question about Azir's wall (this may be a question for RIOT's coding team)
body:
For the briefest of moments when it spawns, all the Shielded soldiers have health bars. Now speaking hypothetically, is it possible for a damage source (lets say a Lux ult) to hit at that exact moment as these health bars are visible, and kill the soldiers preventing the ultimate from finishing its activation?

forget how unlikely it is to happen, is it possible?

replies.body: No.As far as i'm concerned those "health" bars are actually timers and the soldiers only block hitboxes (champions,minions etc)
